entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0167.10100] In the statement 003 - Statement - Statements of Operations (Unaudited) the filer has defined multiple roots calculation elements that do not have a valid calculation tree defined. The root element NetIncomeLoss has sibling root elements of us-gaap:OtherNonoperatingIncome, us-gaap:OperatingIncomeLoss in the filing. The sibling element us-gaap:OtherNonoperatingIncome, us-gaap:OperatingIncomeLoss should appear as a calculation descendant of NetIncomeLoss. This sibling element(s) are defined as calculation descendants in the US GAAP taxonomy.
Rule Element Id:10100 Rule version: 23.0.0RC1 -
[info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[xule:error] rule DQC.US.0167.10100: Rule: DQC.US.0167.10100 - Property 'role' is not a property of a 'role'. - f10q0623_hudsonacq1.htm
